name: Kayra Basaran
description: My passion for architecture drives me to seek new challenges and opportunities for growth constantly. As a third-year student at the Archi- tectural Association School of Architecture in London, I am highly motivated and dedicated to further developing my architectural skills and knowledge. I am eager to learn from experi- enced professionals and seek opportunities to gain hands-on experience in the industry. I am determined to achieve my goals and reach my full potential.

takeaways.description: Responsible for AutoCad plan drawings and concept diagrams. Photoshop renders images. Working on two different themes for two design competi- tions, attending the design team meetings.
Worked in the INWART Gallery’s stand focusing on the works of street artists and was responsible for the introduction, information, and purchasing of the works
Conducted research for the company’s new project in Miami. Made a presentation about how architecture affects the social media
